channel.title: Eyewear Industry News RSS Feed
channel.description: A curated feed of the latest articles in the eyewear and fashion industry

item.title: Title Again re-updated!!! this Ray-Ban Maker Achieves Founder's Vision with $100 Billion Market Value
item.description:
Business News size reduced
Business News size reduced hi Link is here Robin Sequeira hi
Again - Updated this Ray-Ban Maker Achieves Founder's Vision with $100 Billion Market Value
EssilorLuxottica SA, the global eyewear leader, achieved a market value of $100 billion, fulfilling founder Leonardo Del Vecchio's vision. Since his passing in 2022, the company has thrived under Francesco Milleri, expanding its brand portfolio and collaborating with Meta Platforms on innovative smart glasses.
item.author: Robin Sequeira

item.title: Again - Updated this Ray-Ban Maker Achieves Founder's Vision with $100 Billion Market Value
item.description: EssilorLuxottica SA, the global eyewear leader, achieved a market value of $100 billion, fulfilling founder Leonardo Del Vecchio's vision. Since his passing in 2022, the company has thrived under Francesco Milleri, expanding its brand portfolio and collaborating with Meta Platforms on innovative smart glasses.

item.title: Updated -NW77th Unveils Vibrant Fall 2024 Eyewear Collection with Bold Designs
item.description: NW77th's Fall 2024 collection introduces 17 vibrant eyewear models across five series, blending handcrafted surgical steel and custom acetate. Highlights include the Block Steel's metal frames and the Combination's unique designs. NW77th, a family-owned brand, continues its legacy of crafting high-quality eyewear for urban lifestyles.

item.title: Revo Unveils Annika 3 Sunglass, Blending Performance and Elegance
item.description: Revo has launched the Annika 3 sunglass, expanding its collaboration with golfer Annika Sorenstam. This new design combines performance and elegance, featuring NASA-based polarized lenses. A portion of sales supports the ANNIKA Foundation, empowering young women through golf. Available in various styles, it offers superior visual performance.

item.title: Updated Top Sunglasses for Every Outdoor Adventure
item.description: This article reviews the best sunglasses for various outdoor activities, tested by a diverse team in Lake Tahoe. It highlights top picks like Bajio 12 South for overall use and Julbo Density for running. Each pair is evaluated for lens quality, fit, and durability, offering options for every need.

item.title: **Roberto Cavalli Unveils Bold New Eyewear Collection with De Rigo**
item.description: De Rigo Group has launched five new Roberto Cavalli sunglasses styles, showcasing bold designs that blend fashion with art. These premium-quality frames feature unique symbols like the fang and iconic logos, emphasizing luxury and personality. The collection is available in select stores and online, reflecting innovation and excellence.

item.title: Smith Collaborates with Lisa Congdon for Vibrant Eyewear Collection
item.description: Smith collaborates with artist Lisa Congdon for a vibrant eyewear collection, featuring the Bobcat and Sway frames. Congdon's designs reflect her passion for art and cycling. Available exclusively in North America, these limited-edition glasses combine style and functionality, appealing to both fashion enthusiasts and active individuals.

EssilorLuxottica SA, the global eyewear leader, achieved a market value of $100 billion, fulfilling founder Leonardo Del Vecchio's vision. Since his passing in 2022, the company has thrived under Francesco Milleri, expanding its brand portfolio and collaborating with Meta Platforms on innovative smart glasses.
